name: Step Jack
setup: Stand tall, feet together, arms at sides
Engage core and maintain upright posture
steps: Step one foot out to side while raising arms overhead
Step foot back to center while lowering arms
Step other foot out to side while raising arms
Continue alternating sides in steady rhythm
mistakes: Leaning side to side with steps
safety: Low-impact alternative to jumping jacks. Good for joint-sensitive individuals.

prescriptionHints.notes: Excellent low-impact warm-up or active recovery

joints.notes: Joint-friendly alternative when jumping is contraindicated.
